post.description: Initiates a pay now operation for an invoice.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The request details for a pay now operation

200.description: The operation object that represents the status of the operation.

202.description: An operation accepted result that returns a 'Location' header that the client can poll to view the result of the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Validate whether a user is eligible to use the Pay Now feature for the invoice.

200.description: Result of the Pay Now feature eligibility.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the invoices for a billing profile for a given start date and end date. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Partner Agreement or Microsoft Customer Agreement.

parameters.name: periodStartDate
parameters.description: The start date of the billing period for which the invoice is generated. The date is in MM-DD-YYYY format.

parameters.name: periodEndDate
parameters.description: The end date of the billing period for which the invoice is generated. The date is in MM-DD-YYYY format.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Gets a URL to download multiple invoice documents (invoice pdf, tax receipts, credit notes) as a zip file. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Partner Agreement or Microsoft Customer Agreement.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: A list of download details for individual documents.

200.description: A secure URL that can be used to download a an entity until the URL expires.

202.description: An operation accepted result that returns a 'Location' header that the client can poll to view the result of the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Regenerate an invoice by billing account name and invoice name. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

202.description: An operation accepted result that returns a 'Location' header that the client can poll to view the result of the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Gets a URL to download an invoice document. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Partner Agreement, Microsoft Customer Agreement or Enterprise Agreement.

parameters.name: documentName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies an invoice document. This ID may be an identifier for an invoice PDF, a credit note, or a tax receipt.

200.description: A secure URL that can be used to download a an entity until the URL expires.

202.description: An operation accepted result that returns a 'Location' header that the client can poll to view the result of the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Gets a URL to download the summary document for an invoice. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Enterprise Agreement.

200.description: A secure URL that can be used to download a an entity until the URL expires.

202.description: An operation accepted result that returns a 'Location' header that the client can poll to view the result of the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets an invoice by billing account name and ID. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Partner Agreement or Microsoft Customer Agreement.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the invoices for a billing account for a given start date and end date. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Partner Agreement, Microsoft Customer Agreement, or Microsoft Online Services Program.

parameters.name: periodStartDate
parameters.description: The start date of the billing period for which the invoice is generated. The date is in MM-DD-YYYY format.

parameters.name: periodEndDate
parameters.description: The end date of the billing period for which the invoice is generated. The date is in MM-DD-YYYY format.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Gets a URL to download multiple invoice documents (invoice pdf, tax receipts, credit notes) as a zip file.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: A list of download details for individual documents.

200.description: A secure URL that can be used to download a an entity until the URL expires.

202.description: An operation accepted result that returns a 'Location' header that the client can poll to view the result of the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Gets a URL to download an invoice by billing subscription.

parameters.name: documentName
parameters.description: The ID that uniquely identifies an invoice document. This ID may be an identifier for an invoice PDF, a credit note, or a tax receipt.

200.description: A secure URL that can be used to download a an entity until the URL expires.

202.description: An operation accepted result that returns a 'Location' header that the client can poll to view the result of the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets an invoice by subscription ID and invoice ID.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the invoices for a subscription.

parameters.name: periodStartDate
parameters.description: The start date of the billing period for which the invoice is generated. The date is in MM-DD-YYYY format.

parameters.name: periodEndDate
parameters.description: The end date of the billing period for which the invoice is generated. The date is in MM-DD-YYYY format.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets an invoice by ID. The operation is supported for all billing account types.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

DocumentDownloadRequest.description: A list of download details for individual documents.

documentName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies an invoice document. This ID may be an identifier for an invoice PDF, a credit note, or a tax receipt. If omitted, the most recent invoice PDF for the invoice will be returned.

invoiceName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies an invoice.

DocumentDownloadResult.description: A secure URL that can be used to download a an entity until the URL expires.

expiryTime.description: The time in UTC when the download URL will expire.

url.description: The URL to the PDF or .zip file.

date.description: The date when the payment was attempted.

failedPaymentReason.description: The reason that the payment failed.

documentNumbers.description: The document numbers for the invoice document.

externalUrl.description: The URL to download the invoice document if the source is external to Microsoft.Billing.

name.description: The ID that uniquely identifies an invoice document. This ID may be an identifier for an invoice PDF, a credit note, or a tax receipt.

url.description: The URL to download the invoice document if the source is internal to Microsoft.Billing.

source.description: The source of the document. ENF for Brazil and DRS for rest of the world.

InvoiceListResult.description: A container for a list of resources

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

InvoicePaynowRequest.description: The request details for a pay now operation

amount.description: The amount to be paid for the invoice.

paymentMethodName.description: The payment method to be used for the payment.

amountDue.description: Amount due based on this invoice.

azurePrepaymentApplied.description: The amount of Azure prepayment applied to the charges. This field is applicable to billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

billedAmount.description: The total charges for the invoice billing period.

billedDocumentId.description: The Id of the active invoice which is originally billed after this invoice was voided. This field is applicable to the void invoices only.

billingProfileDisplayName.description: The name of the billing profile for which the invoice is generated.

billingProfileId.description: The ID of the billing profile for which the invoice is generated.

creditAmount.description: The total refund for returns and cancellations during the invoice billing period. This field is applicable to billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

creditForDocumentId.description: The Id of the invoice which got voided and this credit note was issued as a result. This field is applicable to the credit notes only.

documents.description: List of documents available to download and view such as invoice, credit note, or tax receipt.

dueDate.description: The due date for the invoice.

freeAzureCreditApplied.description: The amount of free Azure credits applied to the charges. This field is applicable to billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

invoiceDate.description: The date when the invoice was generated.

invoicePeriodEndDate.description: The end date of the billing period for which the invoice is generated. The date is in MM-DD-YYYY format.

invoicePeriodStartDate.description: The start date of the billing period for which the invoice is generated. The date is in MM-DD-YYYY format.

isMonthlyInvoice.description: Specifies if the invoice is generated as part of monthly invoicing cycle or not. This field is applicable to billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

purchaseOrderNumber.description: An optional purchase order number for the invoice.

status.description: The current status of the invoice.

subscriptionDisplayName.description: The name of the billing subscription for which the invoice is generated.

subscriptionId.description: The ID of the subscription for which the invoice is generated.

specialTaxationType.description: Identifies the type of tax calculation used for the invoice. The field is applicable only to invoices with special tax calculation logic.

subTotal.description: The pre-tax amount due. This field is applicable to billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

taxAmount.description: The amount of tax charged for the billing period. This field is applicable to billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

totalAmount.description: The amount due when the invoice was generated. This field is applicable to billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

refundDetails.description: The details of a refund request.

OperationResult.description: A result of an asynchronous operation with details about status and error state.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource.

name.description: The name of the operation result.

status.description: The status of the ARM operation. Completed means that the operation has terminated in a success state. Faulted means that the operation has terminated in a failed state and will not retry any more. Succeeded means that the operation is being executed and there are positive indicators that it will terminate in a success state. Failed means that the operation has failed but will be retried. This can be an early indicator that the service is facing some performance or availability issue. Postponed means that the operation is still being executed, but there are no significant indicators if it will succeed or fail.

error.description: The error details for an unsuccessful operation.

date.description: The date when the payment was made.

PaymentMethodEligibility.description: The payment method eligibility for the Pay Now feature.

family.description: The family of the payment method for the Pay Now feature eligibility.

type.description: The type of the payment method for the Pay Now feature eligibility.

isEligible.description: The status of the payment method for the Pay Now feature eligibility.

reasonCode.description: Indicates the reason for the ineligibility of the payment method for the Pay Now feature.

PaynowEligibilityResult.description: Result of the Pay Now feature eligibility.

reasonCode.description: Indicates the reason for the ineligibility of the Pay Now feature.

paymentMethods.description: The payment methods for the Pay Now feature eligibility.

RebillDetails.description: The rebill details of an invoice.

requestedOn.description: Date when the refund was requested.

approvedOn.description: Date when the refund was approved.

completedOn.description: Date when the refund was completed.

rebillInvoiceId.description: The invoice ID of the rebill invoice for a refund.
